title: Speed Breaker Height Specifications
text: Speed breaker shall have height of 50mm ± 5mm for urban roads with speed limit up to 40 kmph. Width shall be 3.5m ± 0.1m. Construction using concrete mix 1:2:4 with proper curing.

title: Speed Breaker for High Speed Roads
text: For roads with speed limit 40-60 kmph, speed breaker height shall be 75mm ± 5mm, width 3.5m. Use concrete mix M20 for durability.

title: Rumble Strips Specifications
text: Rumble strips shall be 100mm wide, 10mm deep grooves at 300mm spacing. Material: Thermoplastic paint or milled asphalt surface.

title: Transverse Rumble Strips
text: Transverse rumble strips across carriageway width, 150mm width, 15mm raised height, 500mm spacing. Use bituminous mix or thermoplastic.

title: Road Hump Yellow Marking
text: Yellow retroreflective markings on speed breakers, 150mm wide stripes at 300mm spacing. Thermoplastic material with glass beads.

title: Speed Limit Sign Installation
text: Speed limit signs 600mm × 600mm, mounted at 2.5m height, reflective sheeting Type III. Post material: MS pipe 75mm diameter.

title: Advance Warning Signs
text: Triangular warning signs 900mm side length, mounted 150m before speed breaker. Reflective material with appropriate symbol.

title: Speed Breaker Sign Post
text: MS pipe post 75mm diameter, 3mm thickness, 3m length embedded 0.5m in concrete foundation 300mm × 300mm × 600mm.

title: Concrete Foundation for Signs
text: RCC foundation M20 grade, size 300mm × 300mm × 600mm depth for sign posts. Include 4 nos 10mm dia bars.

title: Pavement Delineators
text: Flexible pavement markers with reflectors, height 100mm, base 120mm × 120mm. Material: High impact plastic with retroreflective sheeting.

title: White Edge Line Marking
text: Continuous white edge line 150mm width along carriageway edge. Material: Thermoplastic with minimum 18% glass beads.

title: Yellow Center Line Marking
text: Double yellow center line, each line 100mm width, 150mm gap. Thermoplastic material for no-overtaking zones.

title: Zebra Crossing Markings
text: Pedestrian crossing white stripes 500mm width, 600mm spacing across carriageway. Thermoplastic material 3mm thickness.

title: Stop Line Marking
text: White stop line 300mm width across full carriageway width at intersections. Thermoplastic material with glass beads.

title: W-Beam Metal Beam Guardrail
text: W-beam crash barrier, beam section 310mm × 3mm thickness, galvanized steel. Post spacing 2m c/c, embedded in concrete foundation.

title: Guardrail Support Posts
text: MS I-beam posts 150mm × 75mm × 6mm, length 2m embedded 0.6m in ground. Hot-dip galvanized finish.

title: Concrete Crash Barrier
text: RCC crash barrier New Jersey profile, 810mm height, 600mm base width. Concrete M30 grade with reinforcement.

title: Barrier Reinforcement Steel
text: Reinforcement steel for concrete barriers: 12mm dia bars @ 150mm c/c both faces. HYSD Fe500 grade steel.

title: Guardrail Reflectors
text: Reflective delineators on guardrails, Type III retroreflective material, 100mm × 100mm size at 10m spacing.

title: Impact Attenuator
text: Crash cushion impact attenuator for bridge piers and fixed objects. Crushable material with energy absorption capacity.

title: Bollards for Pedestrian Areas
text: MS pipe bollards 150mm diameter, 1m height above ground, concrete-filled. Base plate 250mm × 250mm × 10mm.

title: Chevron Alignment Signs
text: Chevron signs 600mm × 900mm on curves, reflective Type III sheeting. Black chevron on yellow background.

title: Curve Warning Signs
text: Curve ahead warning signs 900mm triangular, mounted 100m before curve. Type II retroreflective material.

title: Guide Posts
text: MS pipe guide posts 75mm diameter, 1.2m height, white with black band. Embedded 0.3m in concrete foundation.

title: Kilometere Stone
text: RCC kilometer stones 200mm × 150mm × 1000mm, M20 concrete. Reflective numbers both sides.

title: High Mast Lighting
text: High mast lighting tower 25m height with 12 luminaires. MS tubular pole with foundation 2m × 2m × 3m depth.

title: LED Street Light 100W
text: LED street light 100W luminaire, 10m mounting height. MS pole 10m with 3m arm. Concrete foundation 400mm × 400mm × 600mm.

title: Street Light Pole 10m
text: MS tubular pole 10m height, 150mm diameter at base tapering to 100mm at top, 6mm thickness. Hot-dip galvanized.

title: Lighting Pole Foundation
text: RCC foundation M20, size 400mm × 400mm × 600mm with anchor bolts. 4 nos 12mm dia bolts embedded.

title: Regulatory Sign 600mm
text: Circular regulatory signs 600mm diameter, Type III retroreflective sheeting. MS sheet 2mm backing with edge band.

title: Warning Sign 900mm
text: Triangular warning signs 900mm side, Type II retroreflective material. MS sheet 2mm with reflective edging.

title: Informatory Sign Large
text: Rectangular informatory signs 1200mm × 900mm, Type II retroreflective. MS backing sheet 2mm thickness.

title: Direction Sign Board
text: Direction sign with place names and distances, size 1500mm × 600mm. Green background with white lettering, Type III reflective.

title: Overhead Gantry Sign
text: Overhead gantry for signs spanning carriageway. MS structure with 2 support columns and overhead beam.
formula: Variable based on span, avg 0.8 tonnes per 10m span

title: Cantilever Sign Support
text: Cantilever arm for overhead signs, 4m projection. MS tubular section with base plate and anchor bolts.

title: Solar Powered Blinker
text: Solar powered LED blinker for warning signs. 200mm lens, amber color, with 20W solar panel and battery backup.

title: Variable Message Sign
text: Electronic variable message sign (VMS) 3m × 1.5m LED display. Includes controller, power supply, and communication system.

title: Truck Mounted Attenuator
text: Truck mounted impact attenuator for work zones. Energy absorbing cushion system mounted on vehicle.

title: Portable Concrete Barrier
text: Portable concrete barrier 3m length, 810mm height, New Jersey profile. M30 concrete with lifting hooks.

title: Water Filled Barrier
text: Plastic water-filled barrier 1.2m length, 1m height. HDPE material with reflective tape and interlocking system.

title: Traffic Cone 750mm
text: Traffic cone 750mm height, PVC material, orange color with two reflective bands. Weighted base for stability.

title: Traffic Cone 1000mm
text: Large traffic cone 1000mm height for highway use. PVC with three reflective bands, heavy duty weighted base.

title: Barricade Type II
text: Type II barricade 1500mm × 900mm, two reflective rails. MS frame with reflective sheeting, portable with legs.

title: Tubular Marker
text: Vertical tubular marker 1200mm height, 75mm diameter. PVC with reflective bands, spring-mounted base.

title: Arrow Board
text: Electronic arrow board for traffic diversion, 1500mm × 900mm LED display. Solar powered with battery backup.

title: Portable Traffic Light
text: Portable traffic signal system with three-aspect lights. Battery/solar powered, wireless communication capable.

title: Road Safety Audit Kit
text: Complete road safety audit equipment kit including measuring wheel, digital camera, lux meter, speed radar, GPS device.

title: Retroreflectometer
text: Retroreflectometer for measuring retroreflectivity of signs and markings. Portable handheld device with calibration certificate.

title: Anti-Glare Screen
text: Anti-glare screen on median, 1.5m height MS mesh panel. Posts at 3m spacing with concrete foundation.

title: Vegetation Screen
text: Planting of shrubs along median for anti-glare. Species: Duranta, Ixora, or similar dense foliage, 0.5m spacing.

title: Pedestrian Fence
text: MS pedestrian fence 1.1m height, vertical bars at 100mm spacing. Posts at 2m c/c with concrete foundation.

title: Pedestrian Crossing Signal
text: Pedestrian actuated signal with push button. LED signal heads with audible indication for visually impaired.

title: Speed Feedback Sign
text: Electronic speed feedback sign with radar detection. LED display showing vehicle speed, solar powered.

title: Speed Camera System
text: Automated speed enforcement camera system. Includes camera, radar, controller, and communication equipment.

title: Parking Bollard
text: Removable parking bollard, MS pipe 90mm diameter, 800mm height above ground. Lockable mechanism with key.

title: Sight Distance Improvement
text: Clearing vegetation and obstructions to improve sight distance. Includes cutting trees, removing structures within sight triangle.

title: Curve Mirror Installation
text: Convex traffic mirror 600mm diameter on curves with limited visibility. MS post mounting, adjustable angle.

title: Intersection Visibility Enhancement
text: Street lighting at intersection, minimum 4 luminaires. Additional signage and road markings for clear delineation.

title: Footpath Construction
text: RCC footpath 1.5m width, 150mm thickness. M20 concrete over 100mm GSB, surface finished with tiles.

title: Footpath Paver Blocks
text: Concrete paver blocks 60mm thickness for footpath. Over 50mm sand bed and 150mm GSB.

title: Pedestrian Underpass
text: RCC pedestrian underpass 3m width × 2.5m height. M30 concrete structure with lighting and drainage.

title: Pedestrian Overbridge
text: Steel pedestrian overbridge 3m clear width. MS structural steel with staircase and ramp access both sides.
formula: Variable based on span, avg 1.5 tonnes per meter

title: Bus Bay Construction
text: Bus bay 3.5m width × 30m length with 10m taper. Bituminous pavement 75mm BC + 100mm DBM over GSB.

title: Bus Shelter
text: Bus shelter structure 3m × 2m with seating. MS frame with polycarbonate roofing, integrated solar lighting.

title: Cycle Track Pavement
text: Dedicated cycle track 2m width with colored pavement. Red colored concrete or asphalt surface.

title: Cycle Track Separator
text: Physical separator between cycle track and vehicular lane. Precast concrete separator 250mm × 150mm.

title: Drainage Grating Safety
text: Pedestrian-safe drainage grating with narrow slots. Cast iron grating IS:1726 with anti-skid surface.

title: Catch Pit with Grating
text: Roadside catch pit 600mm × 600mm × 900mm depth with CI grating. Includes connection to drainage system.

title: Parking Bay Marking
text: Marked parking bays 2.5m × 5m with thermoplastic paint. White lines 100mm width.

title: Disabled Parking Bay
text: Accessible parking bay 3.6m × 5m with wheelchair symbol marking. Blue colored marking with signage.

title: Tactile Paving for Blind
text: Tactile paving tiles for visually impaired at crossings. Yellow colored concrete tiles with raised pattern.
